Class AvgInterface

java.lang.Object
  AvgInterface

public class AvgInterface
extends java.lang.Object

Class holding a main method to calculate the average binding interface for a protein complex have different conformational topologies.

Since:
0.1
Version:
0.1
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

Constructor Detail

AvgInterface

public AvgInterface(java.util.ArrayList<PDBreader> readers,
                    Naccess naccess)
Constructor.

Parameters:
readers - List of PDBreader objects holding each the content of a single PDB file. The PDB files might be compressed into a tar or gzip file.
naccess - Naccess object to extract SASA for a protein complex and its components.
Method Detail

getResidueId

public static java.lang.String getResidueId(AminoAcid aa)
Returns a string representation of an amino acid.

Parameters:
aa - AminoAcid object
Returns:
String object holding the string representation of the amino acid.

getInterfacesAminoAcids

public final java.util.ArrayList<AminoAcid> getInterfacesAminoAcids()
Returns a list of all binding site atoms found in the union of the PDB files.

Returns:
List of AminoAcid objects that are found at the interface of the dimer.

getInterfacesCounts

public final java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getInterfacesCounts()
Returns the number of occurrences for each interfacial amino acid.

Returns:
Hashtable with keys being the amino acid identifier, where the identifier consist of chainId, residueNumber and residueName.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method. Reads in a PDB file, whose path is given as a first argument on the commandline and calculates binding interfaces to all protein chains given in the PDB file.

Parameters:
args - Array of Strings holding all commandline arguments.
